hero.title: Connecting Talent with Opportunity
hero.description: WIRsuchen is more than just a job board. We're building the future of work by connecting talented individuals with amazing opportunities while helping everyone save money on the things they love.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that finding the right job and getting the best deals shouldn't be complicated. Our platform combines the power of AI with human insight to create meaningful connections between talent and opportunity, while helping our community save money on everyday purchases.

forJobSeekers.title: For Job Seekers
forJobSeekers.description: We understand that job searching can be overwhelming. That's why we've built intelligent matching algorithms and provide personalized recommendations to help you find roles that truly fit your skills and aspirations.

forEmployers.title: For Employers
forEmployers.description: Finding the right talent is crucial for your business success. Our platform helps you reach qualified candidates efficiently while providing tools to manage your hiring process from start to finish.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: We're a diverse team of passionate individuals committed to revolutionizing how people find jobs and discover great deals.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals who have found their dream jobs and amazing deals through WIRsuchen.

hero.title: How can I help?
hero.description: I'm a solo entrepreneur—so you'll always talk to me directly. No bots. No ticket hoops.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.a1: I usually reply within 24 hours on weekdays (48 hours max during busy periods).
faqs.a2: I monitor for urgent issues, but detailed replies may wait until Monday.
faqs.q3: What's the best way to reach you?
faqs.a3: Email for detailed requests; WhatsApp for quick updates. Use the form below if you prefer.
faqs.a4: Yes—use the calendar link above to pick a time that works for you.
faqs.a5: Yes, I offer flexible retainers and on-demand support for ongoing work.
faqs.a6: I'm based in your city here and work with clients worldwide across time zones.

form.title: Prefer to write it out?
form.description: Send me a message and I'll get back to you within 24–48 hours.
form.cardDescription: Share as much detail as you like—screenshots and links help me move faster.
form.name: Name

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: I aim to reply within 24–48 hours on weekdays. During launches, it may take a bit longer.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Upgrade or downgrade at any time.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: For active seekers who want AI tools

q1.question: Can I change plans anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: Is there a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes, all paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

q4.question: Do you offer refunds?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans.
